bibl.title: Homeric and Pharmacologic Medical Recipes in a Greek Papyrus Formulary
bibl.note: P. Harr. [P. Harris] Inv. 303a. Provenance unknown, acquired 1922-1923. On the front (late second / third cent.) portions of two recipes for amulets (the second of these belongs to the genre of iatromagical texts), on the back (fourth cent.) two medical recipes. - Introduction. - Front. - Back.
bibl.seg: Michael Zellmann-Rohrer, Homeric and Pharmacologic Medical Recipes in a Greek Papyrus Formulary.

P. Harr. [P. Harris] Inv. 303a. Provenance unknown, acquired 1922-1923. On the front (late second / third cent.) portions of two recipes for amulets (the second of these belongs to the genre of iatromagical texts), on the back (fourth cent.) two medical recipes. - Introduction. - Front. - Back.
